title: Talon needs to be fixed. he is the most broken champ on the game
body: talon needs to be fixed. he is the most broken champ on the game

replies.body: it all depends on the ability of an opponent because i was a lvl 5 Mastery rank talon versing a lux and i got rekted he is strong but is all depends on the skill the people playing him have
I was playing zed in lane
You should go in for the kill if his ult is down. if you ult him, he can just ult and f*** you over
He currently has just over a 50% winrate, he's not broken but is definitely strong. Do you have any specific qualms with him, like his scaling or his abilities?

Was it Talon Jungle? Or Top?

Curious.
He's not really broken, its just that if he gets ahead, he snowballs hard
